title: Introducing: KU
body:
In my opinion **Feathers** is probably one of the best albums of 2013 that you probably haven’t heard and [**KU**](https://www.facebook.com/pages/KU/482243831787766) is a new pop revelation that you probably haven’t noticed. Born and raised in Greece but with a musical mind travelling further than any continent, his obscure pop visions take shape in exciting forms.

\[bandcamp width=100% height=42 album=4209685295 size=small bgcol=ffffff linkcol=0687f5 t=9\]

A futuristic art pop ensemble so grandiose you can almost feel its long, protective arms wrapping around you.

**Feathers LP** is out now via **Inner Ear Records**.
